narrative.title: 10 Panzer Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: German Panzer Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored division for offensive/defensive operations in Tunisia Campaign. Part of German response to Operation Torch Allied landings.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Coastal plains, mountainous interior (Atlas Mountains), mixed agricultural/desert

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined arms coordination (tanks, motorized infantry, artillery)
Experienced cadre from Eastern Front (division reformed May 1943 after Tunis)

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plains, mountainous interior (Atlas Mountains), mixed agricultural/desert
